title: maapathi naamamu
sahitya:
mApati nAmamu maruvakE manasA marivErE cintalu mAnavE manasA

caraNam 1

samsAra saukhyamu satamani nammi capalada bondaku viphalamu summi
   

caraNam 2

tanuvu astiramani dalacuka nIvu manasija janakuni maraciyunnAvu
   

caraNam 3

dAraputrulu tanDri talli tanavAru taranipoyyE vELa tanaveNTarAru

caraNam 4

paralOka sukhamula bAguga dalaci paramAtmuTagu hari pAdamu golici

caraNam 5

vara nara janmamu vaccEdiyarudu paragati bondEdi bAgaina birudu

caraNam 6

pAmara janula sambhASaNa bAsi pApa vidhAriNi parastuti jEsi

caraNam 7

dEhamu sthiramani teliyaka nIvu mOha sAgaramuna munigiyunnAvu

caraNam 8

parama bhakta gOpAladAsuni pAlincEvADani bhAvinci madini
